CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 5, 1952, pg. 24 reads: "On the Ball - Members of the Kay Club Midgets Baseball team, a group of youngsters who've been making a hit on the baseball front, are pictured above. The youngsters, all 13 or under, are, left to right, front row: Alvin Taylor, Ronald Nelson, Wayne Walker, Joseph Slaughter, Joe Alston, William Norman and Carey Thomas.  Back row: Sterling Green, Vincent Pinkney, Richard Shealey, Marvin Reid, Ken Johnson, Bob Parris, Thomas Baxter and Milton Swan, physical director. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Kay Club Midgets Baseball team, front row from left: Alvin Taylor, Ronald Nelson, Wayne Walker, Joseph Slaughter, Joe Alston, William Norman, Carey Thomas;  back row: Sterling Green, Vincent Pinkney, Richard Shealey, Marvin Reid, Ken Johnson, Bob Parris, Thomas Baxter, and Physical Director Milton Swan Sr., gathered on athletic field
